title: Projects
text: spVarBayes: An R package for fast variational Bayesian inference in large-scale geospatial regression using NNGP. It uses closed-form gradient updates and linear response corrections for calibrated uncertainty at lower cost. A tutorial is available.

title: Research
text: I work on scalable Bayesian inference, variational methods, and spatial models. - Fast Variational Inference for NNGP - Modular Bayes with normalizing flows - Applications in disease mapping and healthcare claims

title: Jiafang Song
text: I am a fifth-year PhD student in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins University, advised by Dr.Â Abhirup Datta. My research focuses on variational inference and machine learning methods, including normalizing flows and neural networks. I previously earned an MS in Biostatistics from Yale University.
